label: 将監
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The third level in the Bodyguards was assiged to much less important figures, the Shōgen, who, like men of their class in other governmental organs, sometimes served as Stewards in the households of Regents and Ministers of State (p. 813).
